import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

youtube = pd.read_csv("../input/trending-youtube-video-statistics-eda/USvideos.csv")
source.267ad35f:
print('Is there any missing value? ', youtube.isnull().values.any())
print('How many missing values? ', youtube.isnull().values.sum())
youtube = youtube.dropna()
print('Number of participants after eliminating missing values: ', len(youtube))
source.42f43425: youtube.nunique()  ##data hakkında çeşitli bilgilere göz gezdirelim.

source.d61b1345: youtube[youtube["views"] == youtube["views"].min()]["title"].iloc[0] ##en düşük görüntülenme alan video

source.19a0a913:
youtube["category_name"] = np.nan

youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 1),"category_name"] = 'Film and Animation'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 2),"category_name"] = 'Cars and Vehicles'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 10),"category_name"] = 'Music'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 15),"category_name"] = 'Pets and Animals'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 17),"category_name"] = 'Sport'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 19),"category_name"] = 'Travel and Events'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 20),"category_name"] = 'Gaming'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 22),"category_name"] = 'People and Blogs'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 23),"category_name"] = 'Comedy'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 24),"category_name"] = 'Entertainment'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 25),"category_name"] = 'News and Politics'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 26),"category_name"] = 'How to and Style'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 27),"category_name"] = 'Education'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 28),"category_name"] = 'Science and Technology'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 29),"category_name"] = 'Non Profits and Activism'
youtube.loc[(youtube["category_id"] == 25),"category_name"] = 'News & Politics'

print("Category Name count")
print(youtube.category_name.value_counts()[::])

youtube["category_name"] = youtube["category_name"] ##kategori isimleri yeni bir sütun olarak eklendi
source.d965a82f:
plt.figure(figsize = (20,10))

name_count_graph = sns.countplot("category_name", data=youtube, palette="Set1")
name_count_graph.set_xticklabels(name_count_graph.get_xticklabels(),rotation=45)
name_count_graph.set_title("Counting the Video Category's ", fontsize=15)
name_count_graph.set_xlabel("", fontsize=12)
name_count_graph.set_ylabel(" Video_Count", fontsize=12) ##kategor isimlerine göre çekilen video sayısı grafiği
source.8af33eef:
plt.figure(figsize = (20,10))
youtube["Views_Distribution"] = np.log(youtube["views"] + 1)
g1 = sns.distplot(youtube["Views_Distribution"])
name_views_graph = sns.boxplot(x="category_name", y="Views_Distribution", data=youtube, palette="Set1")
name_views_graph.set_xticklabels(name_count_graph.get_xticklabels(),rotation=45)
name_views_graph.set_title("Views Distribution by Category Names", fontsize=20)
name_views_graph.set_xlabel("", fontsize=15)
name_views_graph.set_ylabel("Views_Distribution", fontsize=15)  ##kategor isimlerine göre izleyici sayısı grafiği

youtube["category_name"].value_counts().plot.pie(shadow=True, fontsize=30).set_title("Count by category name", fontsize=60);  ##kategori isimlerine göre pasta grafiği çıkartıldı

source.50436522:
plt.figure(figsize = (15,12))

sns.heatmap(youtube[["views", "likes","dislikes", "comment_count", "title_length", "tag_counts", "category_name"]].corr(), annot=True) ##ilgili parametrelerin aralarındaki ilişkiyi gösteren ısı haritası
plt.title("Heatmap", fontsize = 30)
source.b3205f8c:
plt.figure(figsize = (20,10))


ratio_graph = sns.boxplot(x="category_name", y="likes_dislikes_ratio", data=youtube, palette="Set1")
ratio_graph.set_xticklabels(ratio_graph.get_xticklabels(),rotation=45)
ratio_graph.set_title("Likes Dislikes ratio  by Category Names", fontsize=20)
ratio_graph.set_xlabel("", fontsize=15)
ratio_graph.set_ylabel("Ratio", fontsize=15)  ###like dislike oranını kategori isimlerine göre gösteren grafik
source.1f0deb75:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))

views = youtube["views"]

likes = youtube["likes"]

plt.scatter(likes,views)

plt.title("izlenmeye göre beğeni oranı")
plt.xlabel("views")
plt.ylabel("likes")     ##izlenmeye oranla beğeni sayısındaki değişim grafiği çıkartıldı
source.d07f4af7:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))
youtube.groupby("category_id").sum()[["views"]]

sns.barplot(x = "category_id", y = "views", data = youtube, orient = "v")
plt.show()    ##video kategorilerinin izleyici sayısı
source.ebe73db8:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))

views = youtube["views"]

tags = youtube["tag_counts"]

plt.scatter(tags,views)

plt.title("etiket sayısına göre izlenme oranı")
plt.xlabel("tag counts")
plt.ylabel("views")
source.b0a224f7: Haberler ve politikalar kategorisinde dislike oranlarının fazla olduğu dikkat çekmiştir.
